DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation as outlined in the protocol for questions related to the prior administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._To take, accept, or get something offered._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: To take, accept, or get something offered.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received prior th
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with selumetinib or another specific MEK inhibitor or prior MEK, RAS or RAF inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received cytoreduction with hydroxyurea, 6-mercaptopurine, dexamethasone or cyclophosphamide within at least three days prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with a PARP inhibitor or topotecan?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with tyrosine kinase inhibitors (e.g. erlotinib), or anti-EGFR agents (e.g. cetuximab, pamatumamab)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has PHEO/PGL with germline SDH subunit mutation, has patient received prior therapy with 131I-MIBG (in patients with MIBG avid tumors) or cytotoxic chemotherapy (CVD or temozolomide)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior MEK, RAS, or RAF inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with viral-based tumor vaccine?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled in Phase II: Has patient received prior treatment with a TORC1, dual TORC1/2 inhibitor, or BCL-2/xL inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with an MDM2 inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with bevacizumab, ramucirumab or any PARP inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy less than or equal to 4 weeks or, if known 5 half-lives of the prior agent (whichever is shorter) prior to enrollment on protocol (minimum of 1 week between prior therapy and study enrollment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy less than or equal to 4 weeks or, if known agent (whichever is shorter) prior to enrollment on protocol (minimum of 1 week between prior therapy and study enrollment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with bevacizumab, ramucirumab or any PARP inhibitor, including olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has pateint received prior therapy with enzalutamidede or phenobarbital within 5 weeks prior to cycle 1 day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received cytoreduction with hydroxyurea, 6-mercaptopurine, corticosteroids (dexamethasone prednisone or similar) or cyclophosphamide within at least three days prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with tyrosine kinase inhibitors (e.g. erlotinib), or anti-EGFR agents (e.g. cetuximab, panitumumab)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with an MEK inhibitor or an ERK inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received cytoreduction with hydroxyurea, 6-mercaptopurine, corticosteroids (dexamethasone prednisone or similar) or cyclophosphamide within at least three days prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with cabozantinib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with PI3K/AKT inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with Wee1 kinase inhibition?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient previously received gemcitabine plus oxaliplatin therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with olaparib or other PARP1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 28
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to the randomized phase II portion, has patient received prior treatment with a CDK4/6 inhibitor or fulvestrant, or a PI3K inhibitor in the metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received cytoreduction with hydroxyurea, 6-mercaptopurine, corticosteroids (dexamethasone prednisone or similar) or cyclophosphamide within at least 24 hours prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior Docetaxel (or other taxane therapy) in the advanced setting (for the dose escalation cohort only), is patient anticipated to have maintained taxane sensitivity and in the opinion of the investigator would still benefit from further docetaxel therapy.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 29
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with olaparib or other PARPi?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 30
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with platinum-containing regimen or ATR inhibitor for prostate cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with radium-223?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 32
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior chemotherapy to treat the glioma?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 31
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with olaparib or any other PARPi?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 33
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior chemotherapy within 2 weeks (6 weeks for nitrosoureas or mitomycin C) prior to entering the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 35
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with MLN4924 (pevonedistat), azacitidine, or decitabine?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 34
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with radium-223, olaparib or other PARPi?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 37
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received more than 4 prior systemic chemotherapy-based agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 36
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior chemotherapy for AML, excluding hydroxyurea for count control, or ATRA for APML that was initially suspected but later ruled out?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 39
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient previously treated on this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 41
ReferenceDocuments.description: If enrolled in Phase 2, has patient received prior chemotherapy for NSCLC?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 38
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been previously treated with MLN9708 (ixazomib)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 40
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a prior treatment history with fulvestrant or a PI3K inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with any EGFR TKI?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 46
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had any prior treatment with XL184 (cabozantinib), any MET-targeting TKI, or any MET-targeting monoclonal antibody (MetMAb), such as onartuzumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 45
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior topotecan therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 44
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any previous treatment with any poly (adenosine diphosphate[ADP]-ribose) polymerase (PARP) inhibitors, including olaparib, or prior treatment with dacarbazine and/or temozolomide?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 42
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least 2 lines of prior therapy (including at least one PI, excluding MLN9708), or has received 1 prior line of therapy with both a PI (excluding MLN9708) and an immunomodulatory (IMiD) agent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 43
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any previous treatment with AZD6738 or any other ATR inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 47
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to the randomized Phase 2 portion of this study, has patient received prior treatment with a CDK4/6 inhibitor or fulvestrant, or a PI3K inhibitor in the metastatic setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 48
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been previously treated with platinum chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 49
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with MEC?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 50
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with radionuclides (e.g., strontium, samarium, rhenium, radium)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 52
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with XL184 (cabozantinib), or any MET-targeting TKI, or any MET-targeting monoclonal antibody (MetMAb), such as onartuzumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 55
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled to the non-BRD4 exploratory cohort: did the patient previously receive treatment with a BETi, including but not limited to previous GSK525762C therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 51
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least one prior therapy for their condition prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a known CYP3A4 substrate with narrow therapeutic window (such as alfentanil, astemizole, cisapride, dihydroergotamine, pinozide; quinidine, sirolimus or terfanide) within 14 days prior to receiving the first dose of KRT-232 (AMG 232)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 54
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with radionuclides (e.g., strontium, samarium, rhenium, radium)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 53
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least one prior line of platinum-based chemotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 56
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior systemic chemotherapy or immunotherapy for metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 57
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with P13K, AKT, dual P13IK/mTOR inhibitors, TORC 1/ 2 inhibitors or TORC1 inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 58
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior treatment with an anthracycline and taxane in the neoadjuvant, adjuvant, or metastatic setting, unless contraindicated or deemed to be suboptimal therapy per the treating physician?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 60
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior treatment with anti-CTLA-4, have the following criteria been met: Minimum of 12 weeks from the first dose of anti-CTLA-4 and greater than 6 weeks from the last dose and no history of severe immune-related adverse effects from anti-CTLA-4 (NCI CTCAE Grade 3 and 4)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 59
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior treatment with anti-CTLA-4, have the following criteria been met: Minimum of 12 weeks from the first dose of anti-CTLA-4 and 6 weeks from the last dose and no history of severe immune-related adverse effects from anti-CTLA-4 (NCI CTCAE Grade 3 and 4)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 61
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with ATR inhibitor (prior BAY 1895344 or other investigational ATR inhibitors)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 64
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of prior treatment with an ATR inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 63
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with any of the study compounds?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 62
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is enrolled in the safety run-in cohort, has patient received prior XL184 (cabozantinib), PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor, or VEGFR inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 66
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with talazoparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRFTEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior or current treatment with PARP inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 67
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been previously treated with an ATR inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 65
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with Hu5F9-G4 (magrolimab) or any agent targeting CD47-SIRPa or prior treatment with mogamulizumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 70
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with a P13K inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 68
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior treatment with abemaciclib or another specific CDK4/6 inhibitor (ex., Ribociclib, Palbociclib  list is not all inclusive)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 69
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior CDK 4/6 inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 71
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with MLN9708 (ixazomib citrate) or venetoclax?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 73
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with MEK or ERK inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 72
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is in the dose escalation and expansion phases, has patient received less than or equal to 5 lines of prior therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 74
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is to be enrolled in Phase 1 and has received prior treatment with EP or ZEN003694, was dose reduction required due to unacceptable toxicities attributed to the agent(s)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 77
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with a checkpoint inhibitor given for relapsed or metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 75
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least two previous therapies with at least one combination chemotherapy regimen for metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 78
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment (e.g., chemotherapy, radiation, or definitive surgery) for the current locally advanced HNSCC?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 79
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has lymphoma, at least two previous therapies with at least one combination chemotherapy regimen for metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 76
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior therapy with BET, RAF, MEK, or ERK inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 81
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient previously been treated with BAY 1895344?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 80
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with neratinib or DS-8201a?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 82
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with ZEN003694 (ZEN-3694) or who have been treated with an investigational BET inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 84
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any prior therapy aside from resection or biopsy for their recurrent disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 85
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient previously received ZEN003694 (ZEN-3694) or has been treated with an investigational BET inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 86
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with therapeutic oral or IV antibiotics within 2 weeks prior to initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was levocarnitine started prior to first dose of asparaginase?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 87
ReferenceDocuments.description: For dose escalation: Has patient previously received temozolomide or an ATR inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 88
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received at least one prior line of platinum-based systemic therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 89
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been treated with at least 1 prior line of therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 90
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior anti-TIGIT therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 91
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received previous anti-CD47 therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 92
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with BET inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 93
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with 2GAA and taxane- or Lutetium-based therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 94
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has myelodysplastic syndromes (MDS), has patient received prior induction regimens similar to 7+3?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 96
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received previous rituximab therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 97
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient failed 1 line of therapy or received prior CAR T therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient responded (defined as CR or PR or SD with clinical benefit on any post-CAR T cell infusion evaluation) to GD2CART therapy who later develop progressive disease if agreed upon by the PEP-CTN, Protocol Principal Investigator and CTEP
